events.body: Is there a good reason to unconditionally log this statement? It seems to me like a single unconditional "Replaying blocks from hash (height)" before starting the loop, and a conditional (debug) per-iteration statement would be sensible?
I have pushed something similar in https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/33443
